messages.content: You are an expert sports scientist and strength & conditioning coach specializing in personalized training programs.

Create a workout plan for me. I'm a basketball player, intermediate level, looking to improve performance and strength. I can train 4 days a week for 60 minutes. I have access to a gym with basic equipment.

{
  "id": "wp-basketball-intermediate",
  "name": "Basketball Performance Enhancement Plan",
  "description": "A 4-day training program designed to improve basketball-specific performance, focusing on strength, power, agility, and conditioning for intermediate players.",
  "level": "intermediate",
  "goals": ["performance", "strength"],
  "equipment": ["barbell", "dumbbell", "bench", "resistance bands"],
  "weeklyPlan": [
    {
      "day": "Day 1",
      "focus": "Lower Body Strength & Power",
      "duration": "60 min",
      "warmup": "5 minutes light jogging, dynamic stretches focusing on hip mobility, ankle mobility drills",
      "exercises": [
        {
          "name": "Barbell Squats",
          "sets": "4",
          "reps": "6-8",
          "rest": "90 sec",
          "notes": "Focus on depth and maintaining proper form"
        },
        {
          "name": "Box Jumps",
          "sets": "3",
          "reps": "8",
          "rest": "60 sec",
          "notes": "Explosive movement, soft landing"
        },
        {
          "name": "Walking Lunges",
          "sets": "3",
          "reps": "10 each leg",
          "rest": "60 sec",
          "notes": "Hold dumbbells for added resistance"
        },
        {
          "name": "Calf Raises",
          "sets": "3",
          "reps": "15",
          "rest": "45 sec",
          "notes": "Full range of motion"
        },
        {
          "name": "Lateral Bounds",
          "sets": "3",
          "reps": "8 each side",
          "rest": "60 sec",
          "notes": "Focus on stability upon landing"
        }
      ],
      "cooldown": "5 minutes static stretching for quads, hamstrings, and calves"
    },
    {
      "day": "Day 2",
      "focus": "Upper Body Strength & Shooting Mechanics",
      "duration": "60 min",
      "warmup": "Arm circles, shoulder mobility exercises, light resistance band work",
      "exercises": [
        {
          "name": "Bench Press",
          "sets": "4",
          "reps": "8-10",
          "rest": "90 sec",
          "notes": "Control the weight throughout the movement"
        },
        {
          "name": "Pull-ups/Assisted Pull-ups",
          "sets": "3",
          "reps": "8-10",
          "rest": "90 sec",
          "notes": "Full range of motion"
        },
        {
          "name": "Medicine Ball Chest Pass",
          "sets": "3",
          "reps": "12",
          "rest": "60 sec",
          "notes": "Explosive movement similar to passing"
        },
        {
          "name": "Shoulder Press",
          "sets": "3",
          "reps": "10",
          "rest": "60 sec",
          "notes": "Control the weight throughout"
        },
        {
          "name": "Resistance Band Rotational Throws",
          "sets": "3",
          "reps": "12 each side",
          "rest": "45 sec",
          "notes": "Mimic shooting motion with resistance"
        }
      ],
      "cooldown": "5 minutes stretching for chest, shoulders, and back"
    },
    {
      "day": "Day 3",
      "focus": "Agility & Conditioning",
      "duration": "60 min",
      "warmup": "5 minutes light jogging, dynamic stretches, ankle hops",
      "exercises": [
        {
          "name": "Ladder Drills",
          "sets": "3",
          "reps": "30 sec each pattern",
          "rest": "45 sec",
          "notes": "Focus on quick feet and coordination"
        },
        {
          "name": "Defensive Slides",
          "sets": "4",
          "reps": "30 sec",
          "rest": "30 sec",
          "notes": "Stay low in athletic stance"
        },
        {
          "name": "Cone Sprints",
          "sets": "5",
          "reps": "20 yards",
          "rest": "60 sec",
          "notes": "Focus on acceleration and deceleration"
        },
        {
          "name": "Jump Rope",
          "sets": "3",
          "reps": "60 sec",
          "rest": "30 sec",
          "notes": "Quick, light jumps"
        },
        {
          "name": "Shuttle Runs",
          "sets": "4",
          "reps": "30 sec",
          "rest": "30 sec",
          "notes": "Focus on changing direction quickly"
        }
      ],
      "cooldown": "5 minutes light jogging followed by full-body stretching"
    },
    {
      "day": "Day 4",
      "focus": "Core Strength & Balance",
      "duration": "60 min",
      "warmup": "5 minutes light cardio, dynamic core activation exercises",
      "exercises": [
        {
          "name": "Plank Variations",
          "sets": "3",
          "reps": "30-45 sec each",
          "rest": "45 sec",
          "notes": "Include front, side, and rotating planks"
        },
        {
          "name": "Russian Twists",
          "sets": "3",
          "reps": "20 total",
          "rest": "45 sec",
          "notes": "Use medicine ball for added resistance"
        },
        {
          "name": "Single-Leg Balance Exercises",
          "sets": "3",
          "reps": "30 sec each leg",
          "rest": "30 sec",
          "notes": "Add basketball dribbling for challenge"
        },
        {
          "name": "Hanging Leg Raises",
          "sets": "3",
          "reps": "12",
          "rest": "60 sec",
          "notes": "Control the movement"
        },
        {
          "name": "Medicine Ball Slams",
          "sets": "3",
          "reps": "15",
          "rest": "45 sec",
          "notes": "Explosive core movement"
        }
      ],
      "cooldown": "5 minutes stretching focusing on core and lower back"
    }
  ]
}
You are an expert nutritionist and sports dietitian specializing in personalized meal plans.
Create a meal plan for me. I'm a runner training for a marathon, looking to improve endurance and recovery. I don't eat red meat and prefer to have 5 smaller meals throughout the day.

{
  "id": "mp-marathon-runner",
  "name": "Marathon Runner's Endurance Nutrition Plan",
  "description": "A balanced meal plan designed for marathon runners, focusing on complex carbohydrates, lean proteins, and nutrient timing to support endurance training and recovery.",
  "dailyPlans": [
    {
      "day": "Day 1",
      "meals": [
        {
          "name": "Early Morning (Pre-Run)",
          "time": "6:00 AM",
          "foods": [
            {
              "name": "Banana",
              "servingSize": "1 medium",
              "calories": 105,
              "protein": 1.3,
              "carbs": 27,
              "fat": 0.4,
              "notes": "Quick source of energy"
            },
            {
              "name": "Rice Cake with Honey",
              "servingSize": "2 cakes, 1 tbsp honey",
              "calories": 130,
              "protein": 2,
              "carbs": 28,
              "fat": 1,
              "notes": "Easy to digest carbohydrates"
            }
          ],
          "totalCalories": 235,
          "totalProtein": 3.3,
          "totalCarbs": 55,
          "totalFat": 1.4
        },
        {
          "name": "Breakfast (Post-Run)",
          "time": "8:30 AM",
          "foods": [
            {
              "name": "Oatmeal with Berries",
              "servingSize": "1 cup cooked",
              "calories": 150,
              "protein": 5,
              "carbs": 27,
              "fat": 2.5,
              "notes": "Slow-release carbs for sustained energy"
            },
            {
              "name": "Greek Yogurt",
              "servingSize": "3/4 cup",
              "calories": 100,
              "protein": 18,
              "carbs": 5,
              "fat": 0.5,
              "notes": "Recovery protein"
            },
            {
              "name": "Mixed Nuts",
              "servingSize": "1 oz",
              "calories": 170,
              "protein": 5,
              "carbs": 7,
              "fat": 15,
              "notes": "Healthy fats and additional protein"
            }
          ],
          "totalCalories": 420,
          "totalProtein": 28,
          "totalCarbs": 39,
          "totalFat": 18
        },
        {
          "name": "Mid-Morning Snack",
          "time": "11:00 AM",
          "foods": [
            {
              "name": "Apple with Almond Butter",
              "servingSize": "1 medium apple, 1 tbsp almond butter",
              "calories": 200,
              "protein": 4,
              "carbs": 25,
              "fat": 10,
              "notes": "Balanced energy with fiber"
            },
            {
              "name": "Electrolyte Water",
              "servingSize": "16 oz",
              "calories": 10,
              "protein": 0,
              "carbs": 3,
              "fat": 0,
              "notes": "Hydration and electrolyte replenishment"
            }
          ],
          "totalCalories": 210,
          "totalProtein": 4,
          "totalCarbs": 28,
          "totalFat": 10
        }
      ],
      "totalCalories": 2145,
      "totalProtein": 130.3,
      "totalCarbs": 270,
      "totalFat": 65.4,
      "notes": "Focus on hydration throughout the day. Aim for at least 3 liters of water, more on heavy training days."
    }
  ],
  "calorieTarget": 2100,
  "macroSplit": {
    "protein": 25,
    "carbs": 55,
    "fat": 20
  }
}
You are an expert sports scientist and strength & conditioning coach specializing in personalized training programs.
I need a workout plan. I'm a beginner with weight loss goals. I can only train 3 days a week for 30 minutes. I only have dumbbells and resistance bands at home.

{
  "id": "wp-beginner-weight-loss",
  "name": "Home Weight Loss Program for Beginners",
  "description": "A 3-day home workout program designed for beginners focusing on weight loss, using minimal equipment while maximizing calorie burn and building foundational strength.",
  "level": "beginner",
  "goals": ["weight", "health"],
  "equipment": ["dumbbells", "resistance bands"],
  "weeklyPlan": [
    {
      "day": "Day 1",
      "focus": "Full Body Circuit",
      "duration": "30 min",
      "warmup": "5 minutes of marching in place, arm circles, and light dynamic stretches",
      "exercises": [
        {
          "name": "Dumbbell Squats",
          "sets": "3",
          "reps": "12",
          "rest": "30 sec",
          "notes": "Hold dumbbells at shoulders or sides"
        },
        {
          "name": "Dumbbell Push Press",
          "sets": "3",
          "reps": "10",
          "rest": "30 sec",
          "notes": "Start with dumbbells at shoulders, use legs to help press overhead"
        },
        {
          "name": "Resistance Band Rows",
          "sets": "3",
          "reps": "12",
          "rest": "30 sec",
          "notes": "Anchor band to a sturdy object at chest height"
        },
        {
          "name": "Dumbbell Romanian Deadlift",
          "sets": "3",
          "reps": "10",
          "rest": "30 sec",
          "notes": "Focus on hip hinge movement, slight knee bend"
        },
        {
          "name": "Mountain Climbers",
          "sets": "3",
          "reps": "30 seconds",
          "rest": "30 sec",
          "notes": "Keep core engaged, moderate pace"
        }
      ],
      "cooldown": "5 minutes of walking in place followed by full-body static stretching"
    },
    {
      "day": "Day 2",
      "focus": "Cardio and Core",
      "duration": "30 min",
      "warmup": "5 minutes of jumping jacks, high knees, and torso twists",
      "exercises": [
        {
          "name": "Resistance Band Jumping Jacks",
          "sets": "3",
          "reps": "45 seconds",
          "rest": "30 sec",
          "notes": "Place band under feet, hold handles while performing jumping jacks"
        },
        {
          "name": "Dumbbell Russian Twists",
          "sets": "3",
          "reps": "10 each side",
          "rest": "30 sec",
          "notes": "Hold one dumbbell with both hands, feet elevated if possible"
        },
        {
          "name": "Resistance Band Bicycle Crunches",
          "sets": "3",
          "reps": "12 each side",
          "rest": "30 sec",
          "notes": "Anchor band behind head, add resistance to the crunch motion"
        },
        {
          "name": "Plank with Dumbbell Pull-Through",
          "sets": "3",
          "reps": "6 each side",
          "rest": "30 sec",
          "notes": "In plank position, pull dumbbell from one side to the other"
        },
        {
          "name": "High Knees with Resistance Band",
          "sets": "3",
          "reps": "30 seconds",
          "rest": "30 sec",
          "notes": "Place band around thighs just above knees"
        }
      ],
      "cooldown": "5 minutes of deep breathing exercises and core stretches"
    },
    {
      "day": "Day 3",
      "focus": "Metabolic Conditioning",
      "duration": "30 min",
      "warmup": "5 minutes of light jogging in place, arm swings, and hip circles",
      "exercises": [
        {
          "name": "Dumbbell Thruster",
          "sets": "3",
          "reps": "10",
          "rest": "30 sec",
          "notes": "Combine squat and overhead press in one fluid movement"
        },
        {
          "name": "Resistance Band Lateral Walks",
          "sets": "3",
          "reps": "10 steps each direction",
          "rest": "30 sec",
          "notes": "Place band around ankles or just above knees"
        },
        {
          "name": "Dumbbell Renegade Rows",
          "sets": "3",
          "reps": "6 each arm",
          "rest": "30 sec",
          "notes": "Start in push-up position with hands on dumbbells, row one arm at a time"
        },
        {
          "name": "Resistance Band Squat to Row",
          "sets": "3",
          "reps": "12",
          "rest": "30 sec",
          "notes": "Anchor band at waist height, squat and row in one movement"
        },
        {
          "name": "Dumbbell Skier Swings",
          "sets": "3",
          "reps": "15",
          "rest": "30 sec",
          "notes": "Hold dumbbells at sides, hinge at hips and swing arms forward to shoulder height"
        }
      ],
      "cooldown": "5 minutes of walking in place followed by full-body stretching"
    }
  ]
}
